remarks: Lemma for ~ lcfr .  Note that ` X ` is z in Mario's notes.  (Contributed by NM, 27-Feb-2015.)
statement:
lcfrlem1.v $e |- V = ( Base ` U ) $.
lcfrlem1.s $e |- S = ( Scalar ` U ) $.
lcfrlem1.q $e |- .X. = ( .r ` S ) $.
lcfrlem1.z $e |- .0. = ( 0g ` S ) $.
lcfrlem1.i $e |- I = ( invr ` S ) $.
lcfrlem1.f $e |- F = ( LFnl ` U ) $.
lcfrlem1.d $e |- D = ( LDual ` U ) $.
lcfrlem1.t $e |- .x. = ( .s ` D ) $.
lcfrlem1.m $e |- .- = ( -g ` D ) $.
lcfrlem1.u $e |- ( ph -> U e. LVec ) $.
lcfrlem1.e $e |- ( ph -> E e. F ) $.
lcfrlem1.g $e |- ( ph -> G e. F ) $.
lcfrlem1.x $e |- ( ph -> X e. V ) $.
lcfrlem1.n $e |- ( ph -> ( G ` X ) =/= .0. ) $.
lcfrlem1.h $e |- H = ( E .- ( ( ( I ` ( G ` X ) ) .X. ( E ` X ) ) .x. G ) ) $.
lcfrlem1 $p |- ( ph -> ( H ` X ) = .0. ) $.
